product_name: Jagwire Disc Brake Pads for Shimano Deore Brakes
long_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed for use with Shimano Deore M555 hydraulic disc brakes. HeatShield(R) technology resists heat buildup; brakes stay cool and improve control in critical situations. Special compound minimizes squeal when braking. Set of two. Compatible with Shimano Deore M515, M555 and M555-M disc brakes.
short_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed for use with Shimano Deore M555 hydraulic disc brakes.
